title: "Step in" to hire PHP, OpenSource, iOS or Android developers.
content:
Specialties/Expertise:

- PHP MVC development  
- Strong control over OOP concepts  
- Agile practical implementation  
- API Development / Integration : REST API, Opentok API(Live video chat), Google Map, Linkedin API, Facebook Graph API  
- MVC Frameworks : Symfony, CakePHP  
- Jquery,JavaScript, CSS, AJAX and DHTML  
- Database Management : MySQL, PgSQL, sqlite  
- Version Control System Administration : Git, SVN, CVS  
- Open Sources : Magento, Drupal, WordPress  
- Mobile Solutions: iPhone, Android, Responsive Mobile Websites

Minimum Hourly Rate $15

Following are the list of services provide by us

 [http://www.stepin-solutions.com/services-agile-development](http://web.archive.org/web/20140702071549/http:/www.stepin-solutions.com/services-agile-development "http://www.stepin-solutions.com/services-agile-development")  
Service Description

StepIn Solutions is a closely-knit team of 20, sharing more than 15 years of experience in developing both off the shelf and open source solutions to deliver on-time and on-budget results.

With StepIn Solutions, you will feel confident knowing that you have a hard working, dedicated team who will not sleep until they have delivered beyond your expectations.

We will always guarantee you honesty, whether it is good news or bad. Rather than have a partner who will tell you everything is going great right up until the moment where it isn't, StepIn Solutions prides itself on it's open and forthcoming communications. Web development, like any creative act, is not always painless. If there is an issue, we will bring it to your attention.

On call 24/7, by e-mail, Skype, SMS or phone, we will be there to answer your questions, assist with an issue, or to take care of an emergency.  
Best Regards,  
Pratik Upadhyay

[http://www.stepin-solutions.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140702071549/http:/www.stepin-solutions.com/ "http://www.stepin-solutions.com/")
